events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because the product I got does not match what I ordered.
The customer's issue has been categorized under 'Refund' due to keywords such as refund and request for money back.
Support agent John has been assigned to handle the refund request and initiate the next steps with the customer.
Hello, this is John from customer support. I understand you received the wrong item, and I'd like to help you get this resolved quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund request?
Thanks for the quick response. Here is my order number 56789 and attached is the photo showing the item I received is completely different from the order.
We have reviewed your photos and order details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method. The refund should appear within 5 business days.
Thank you for the prompt solution. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund quickly.
The refund process has been completed successfully, and the case will be closed shortly. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
We are following up to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if there's anything else we can assist you with.
The case has been formally closed as the refund was successfully processed and the customer confirmed satisfaction with the resolution.
